products.productName: SkinCeuticals Triple Lipid Restore 2:4:2
products.product_tag_text: Complimentary gift will be awarded at the cart. Offer valid for a limited time only, while stocks last.
products.description:
Treat your skin to the smoothing properties of SkinCeuticals Triple Lipid Restore 2:4:2, an anti-aging cream that improves the texture of skin while directly addressing age-related lipid loss.

Working to nourish and visibly improve the appearance of skin, the moisturizer is formulated with a concentration of lipids (2% pure ceramides, 4% natural cholesterol and 2% fatty acids) easily utilized by skin, and fortified with the first and patented 2:4:2 cholesterol-dominant ratio to help restore skin's barrier while supporting natural self-repair. Lightweight and fast-absorbing, the cream melts effortlessly into skin, effectively improving texture, fullness and the appearance of pores. Expect a brighter, more even-looking canvas that feels smooth, comforted and youthful. Enriched with an essential oil blend of Lavender, Rosemary, and Peppermint Oil for a cooling, comforting effect.

In an 8-week study, Triple Lipid Restore 2:4:2 significantly improved the appearance of key visible signs of accelerated aging.1 � 66% improvement in smoothness � 35% improvement in laxity � 20% improvement in evenness � 26% improvement in radiance � 44% improvement in pore appearance In a lipidomic study, use of this cream resulted in a 57% increase in ceramides, 50% increase in cholesterol, and 12% increase in fatty acids in the form of triglycerides.

Essential Lipids: featuring natural cholesterol, pure ceramides and fatty acids, it restores skin's youthful elasticity and hydration cycles
Vitamin E: supports natural cell repair and reproduction, helping defend against environmental damage
Essential Oils: packed with antioxidants to fight free-radical damage that is responsible for signs of aging

products.productName: SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic with 15% L-Ascorbic Acid Vitamin C Serum 30ml
products.product_tag_text: Complimentary gift will be awarded at the cart. Offer valid for a limited time only, while stocks last.
products.description:
Experience advanced environmental protection with SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic; a potent Vitamin C serum that delivers visible anti-aging benefits. Free from parabens, the formula is gentle yet effective and is suitable for normal, dry and even sensitive skin types. The serum delivers an array of enviable benefits that last over 72 hours. Simply smooth 4-5 drops of the fast-absorbed solution over the face, neck and d�colletage.

Boasting an antioxidant blend of 15% Pure Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid), 1% Vitamin E (Alpha Tocopherol) and 0.5% Ferulic Acid, the daytime serum envelops skin in a protective veil. This shields the visage from age-inducing free radicals, infrared radiation and ozone pollution, which can all contribute to visible signs of skin aging.

Alongside essential antioxidant performance, the C E Ferulic serum reduces current signs of aging, while visibly brightening the visage. The serum is able to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and photodamage, alongside combating loss of elasticity to leave skin firm and youthful. Expect exceptional protection.

Now clinically proven to reduce combined oxidative damage from free radicals generated by UV, Ozone, and Diesel Exhaust by up to 41%. U.S. Patent No. 7,179,841
products.product_ingredients:
15% L-ascorbic acid - highly potent form of pure vitamin C helps neutralize free radicals and protect against oxidative stress while providing visible anti-aging benefits
1% alpha tocopherol - This pure form of vitamin E neutralizes free radicals and replenishes skin lipids. It has been proven to act synergistically with vitamin C.
0.5% ferulic acid - A plant-based antioxidant, ferulic acid neutralizes free radicals and enhances the antioxidant benefits and stability of vitamins C and E.

products.description:
Experience advanced environmental protection with SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic; a potent Vitamin C serum that delivers visible anti-aging benefits. Free from parabens, the formula is gentle yet effective and is suitable for normal, dry and even sensitive skin types. The serum delivers an array of enviable benefits that last over 72 hours. Simply smooth 4-5 drops of the fast-absorbed solution over the face, neck and d�colletage.

Boasting an antioxidant blend of 15% Pure Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid), 1% Vitamin E (Alpha Tocopherol) and 0.5% Ferulic Acid, the daytime serum envelops skin in a protective veil. This shields the visage from age-inducing free radicals, infrared radiation and ozone pollution, which can all contribute to visible signs of skin aging.

Alongside essential antioxidant performance, the C E Ferulic serum reduces current signs of aging, while visibly brightening the visage. The serum is able to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and photodamage, alongside combating loss of elasticity to leave skin firm and youthful. Expect exceptional protection.

Now clinically proven to reduce combined oxidative damage from free radicals generated by UV, Ozone, and Diesel Exhaust by up to 41%. U.S. Patent No. 7,179,841

0.5% ferulic acid - A plant-based antioxidant, ferulic acid neutralizes free radicals and enhances the antioxidant benefits and stability of vitamins C and E.

products.product_ingredients: Octyldodecanol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Olyethylene, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Hydrogenated Egetable Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Oryza Sativa Cera/Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Cera Alba/Beeswax, Glyceryl Dibehenate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Il Unsaponifiables, Hydroxystearic/Linolenic/Oleic Polyglycerides, Jojoba Esters, Tribehenin, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Safflower Oil/Palm Oil Aminopropanediol Esters, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Glyceryl Behenate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Extract, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Hordeum Vulgare Cera/Spent Grain Wax, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil, Mel/Honey, Peg-8, Qua/Water, Citric Acid, Limonene, Citral, Linalool, Geraniol [N2007/A].
